price: 9. Puis je me suis adressé à eux tantôt ouvertement, tantôt sur le ton de la confidence.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
